text: A new question asked about housing tenure, whether the accommodation occupied by each household was held by them as owner-occupiers; occupied in connection with a Town Corporation) or a private landlord (if so, whether furnished or unfurnished); or occupied on some other terms. The analysis of private households by size and various characteristics of their members has become increasingly important.
